name: Line 6 POD HD500X Edit Bundle
summary: Bundle file created by Line 6 POD HD500X Edit, a DAW program that enables you to edit and create instrument sound effects; contains up to 8 setlists with presets; once loaded, will change the settings for "FX," "AMPS," "Mixer," and "Controllers," which create different sounds from your interment depending on how you customize them.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
